thread.section_title: Club Quarters Hotel, Grand Central - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good
thread.title_full: Good - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Grand Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Pedro S
title: Good
text:
This hotel is not great and you will probably be disappointed the first time you check in.
After the first impression you will discover that the hotel is very convenient with a fountain per floor where you can filled in a bottle of water. You have free coffee in the top floor. The gym is small but convenient.
The restaurant is good and rooms are ok
